text: makĩĩra Daudi atĩrĩ, “Ndũngĩtoonya gũkũ.” No rĩrĩ, Daudi nĩagĩtunyanire gĩikaro kĩu kĩairigĩirwo na thingo cia hinya gĩa Zayuni, Itũũra Inene rĩa Daudi.11:5 Tene kĩrĩma kĩrĩa kĩarĩ mwena wa irathĩro wa Jerusalemu nĩkĩo kĩoĩkaine ta “Zayuni” no thuutha-inĩ rĩĩtwa rĩu rĩarũgamĩrĩire Jerusalemu yothe.
